Articles.Content: The Cyclone escape lander is a single-use emergency escape vehicle, for use on only the most important heavy cruisers, and for capital/flagship attack air/spacecraft. It can land without assistance from its engines, is equipped with ASAS, and can be fitted with weapons as custom. For use on single-use cruisers [ones where the main section is not designed to land eg. orbital attack cruisers/things which are too massive for landing gear] or vessels whose crews need to survive for prestige, even if the war section is damaged or destroyed.
